main event: A rounded object with a shiny top was observed at Nantucket Point, Long Island, N.Y., displaying fantastic maneuvers and blue light.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be at an altitude of 1,000 feet with a diameter of 75 feet., The object executed turns, flips, and maneuvers at high speeds., Several witnesses reported a bright flash of light from the object., One witness described the object as casting no shadow while moving smoothly., The sighting lasted for about 15 to 20 seconds before the object faded out in the distance.
sighted object: rounded object with a shiny top
witness description: Individuals including a police officer, a motel owner, and workers in the area.
